price: Na Yεbεbͻ Totorobεnto no mu; saa Da no na yabͻ (nnipa) kͻkͻ wͻ ho no.
arabic: وَنُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِۚ ذَٰلِكَ يَوۡمُ ٱلۡوَعِيدِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wanufikha fī al-ṣūri dhālika yawmu al-waʿīdi
